rules_text:
As you cast a card named Spree Slasher for the first time in a game, choose and note a number.
When Spree Slasher enters, destroy target creature with mana value equal to a number noted this game for cards named Spree Slasher.
Whenever Spree Slasher deals combat damage to a player, you may return it to its owner’s hand.
notes: some rewording to work within the rules
